Title: Resource Gathering
Description:
Oh, the poor peasants...

They are cowards, yes, of course. But they don't know how to fight, and they go out to collect lumber for our efforts... the Horde targets them... It's just awful all around!

But, we need that lumber if we're going to hold out. Go out and collect any they've dropped.
ObjectivesText: Collect 12 Lion's Landing Lumber by recovering it from piles of Hastily Abandoned Lumber.
